Photographer: [Photographer's Name] If the photographer's name is not known please indicate IPPA Staff as the Photographer
label: The promise of a live television feed of the funeral of Lubavitcher Rebbe, Menahem Mendel Scneerson in New York, 12 June 1994, was not enough to persvade 2,000 Habadnikim to stay in israel and watch the proceedings on TV.
